citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:00 PM on
12/14/23.
The inspector arrived at 1:00 PM on 12/14/23 to conduct an inspection. The individual in the mercantile contacted the
authorized person by phone who told the inspector that they were at an off-site location and were not available. An AWA
compliance inspection could not be conducted because there was no other authorized facility representative available to
accompany the inspector.
Unannounced inspections are used to evaluate compliance with the AWA Regulations and Standards. This is the FIRST
attempted inspection of the Licensee.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:00 PM on 
12/14/23.  
 
The inspector arrived at 1:00 PM on 12/14/23 to conduct an inspection. The individual in the mercantile contacted the 
authorized person by phone who told the inspector that they were at an off-site location and were not available. An AWA 
compliance inspection could not be conducted because there was no other authorized facility representative available to 
accompany the inspector.  
 
Unannounced inspections are used to evaluate compliance with the AWA Regulations and Standards. This is the FIRST 
attempted inspection of the Licensee. 
 
 
End Section
